title: LPAQ cas advert submission properties
description: Schema defining any advert specific properties for LPAQ submissions

affectsScheduledMonument.description: Indicates that a scheduled monument is affected

hasProtectedSpecies.description: Indicates the existence of protected species

isAonbNationalLandscape.description: Indicates an area of outstanding beauty (National Landscape)

consultedBodiesDetails.description: The details of the bodies consulted

isSiteInAreaOfSpecialControlAdverts.description: Indicates if the site is in an area of special control for adverts

wasApplicationRefusedDueToHighwayOrTraff.description: Indicates if the application was refused because of highway or traffic public safety?

didAppellantSubmitCompletePhotosAndPlans.description: Indicates if the appellant submitted complete and accurate photographs and plans
